name: copilotprompts-m365-generate-releasenotes-from-devops-email-markdown-prompt
title: Generate Release Notes from DevOps email query
shortDescription: Generates well formatted Release Notes from a DevOps email query.
longDescription: This prompt will help you to generate well formatted Release Notes from a DevOps email query, helping to automate the process

thumbnails.alt: Prompt for Copilot for Microsoft 365 showing how to generate release notes, from an email received from an Azure DevOps query in your inbox
